entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 22 April 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: N 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 8.

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero.
